"Life is tough.....Get a BIBLE!!!!! And its very true
" Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and lean not on your own understandings. In all your ways aknowledge him, and he will make your paths strait." Prverbs 3: 5-6
"If you want to make God laugh.....tell him your plans for the future!!!" I hate when she tells me that!!!!!

Did you know that: Only 5 out of 12 scientists believe in the big bang theory.......and that the rest argue the fact that there wasnt a big bang, that there has to be a creator!!!!! there might be hope after all

OMG tonight was so much fun!!!!!! It was a blast We went to go see Around the world in 80 days.....kinda lame but we made it fun!!!!!As usual Well we were out of the movie and Josh and I decide to flip all the benches around and upside down.......that wasn't enough......We then proceeded to put chairs on top of tables in all kindsa ways!!!!! So much fun.......And IM sure ur thinkin "stupid kids!!!!" ur right but it was worth it!!!!!!!! And I was so close to hugin a wal-mart person but I couldn't get over to the store so I was mad...... well that was my fun filled evening, cant wait to do it again!!!!!
Hey this is to my girl Brittany!!!!!!!!! i love u soooo much i miss u too!!!!!!!!! cant wait to see ya again Wal-mart rocks my socks!!!!!!! Love ya ~eric

again, answer the question by clicking the comment button!!! Thanks Which is the best coffee shop??? If you said Starbucks, what do u get there?

Ok this is to ALL my video game friends......there are a lot of sites that have free, yes FREE games. Newgrounds.com is a good one for flash games, but its definently made for the older croud, so if u go there dont do it with the rents around!!!! Then there's ebaumsworld.com which is the same as newgrounds, but has more variety, but the same deal here.. The best place to go for clean games is addictinggames.com!!!!! tons of games and all of them are clean...i think there are a couple other places but im tired of typin this so have fun!!!

I cant believe its only 15 days till school!!!!!!! Bummer i didnt get to surf much this summer, and i had to work most the time!!!! I hate my job but, soon it will be over and NEVER again will i do this!!!!!!!! well anyways..... Im kinda lookin forward to school cuz of drivers ed.....but im not lookin forward to annoying teachers and stupid homework!!!!!! (i hate both) But i have to go so i might as well stop complaining!! Later dudes and dudets Im a Dude, he's a Dude, she's a Dude, cuz we're all dudes hey!!!

hey folks, im at home talkin to ppl, and i just relized, i have the weirdest job hours ever!!! Like every monday and friday i have off, and i never know when my boss will pick me up in the morning so i have to guess.....u could say its rather annoying. But yet again today im stuck at home. But other than that, i think i might go to a movie tonight that would be fun well uve been great readers have a better day than mine!!! ~Eric
